casebody.data:
ESTATE OF EPLEY EX REL. EPLEY
v.
BOARD OF TRUSTEES OF TEACHERS' and State Employees' Retirement System Div. No. COA06-689. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed March 6, 2007. Certification March 26, 2007. Appeal from the Ashe (05CVS226).

Case reported without published opinion. Dismissed.
